channel.title: I need help with a client on windows vista... please help
channel.description: i am running on a 32 bit windows vista computer.... i run the client normaly (anyclient) and when i log onto the server. i can take two steps then the client closes and i get a notepad named "hs_err_pid3312" i have jdk update 14... i can use a 508 server fine and runescape but not a 317 ive made topics before about this but no one has helped. ive reloaded java but its still not working.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2009, 05:30:38 pm[/size][hr]anybody?

item.title: I need help with a client on windows vista... please help

  2. Like bbl said, its a java related error
